text: Neocrinus is a genus of crinoids in the family Isocrinidae, and contains only two known species. They appeared on Earth 23.03 million years ago in the Miocene Epoch. ==Species== * Neocrinus blakei (Carpenter, 1884) * Neocrinus decorus (Thomson, 1864) ==References== Category:Isocrinida Category:Crinoid genera
title: Neocrinus
